titleStmt.title: The true copy of a Welch sermon preached before Prince aurice in Wales upon his departure thence by Shon up Owen, Priest. VVherein is desired that Prince Maurice would not plunder her townes and villages, for they were all poore men and not able to buy her a new cushion to make her preach on. For which sermon Iohn up Owen was committed to prison, put by her benefice, and exiled the country: whereunto is added John up Owens complaint for her sad losse.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
